HOME.TITLE: HOME
HOME.CONTENT: My name is Sebastian Vintoñuke, I am a programmer/developer. Currently, I am also a Computer Engineering student at the University of Buenos Aires. I have a special interest in technology related to application development and its areas like data science, cybersecurity, or networks. I consider myself enthusiastic about learning new technologies and work methodologies. Incorporating everything that allows me to create more readable, reliable, efficient, secure, and maintainable code.

PROJECTS.TITLE: PROJECTS
PROJECTS.BANNER: Here you can see some of my projects

SOKOBAN.TITLE: Sokoban Web
SOKOBAN.CONTENT: Sokoban is a classic puzzle game invented in Japan, usually implemented as a video game. The original game was created by Hiroyuki Imabayashi, who in 1980 won a competition against a computer with his game. Hiroyuki Imabayashi is the president of Thinking Rabbit Inc. in Japan. Over the years, many versions of the game have appeared for all platforms, and new collections of levels are constantly being created. Sokoban means 'warehouse keeper' in Japanese.
SOKOBAN.BANNER: Web Minigame (MEVN: MongoDB, Express, VueJS, and NodeJS)

RECOMENDIFY.TITLE: Recomendify
RECOMENDIFY.CONTENT: Recomendify is an application that allows the user to obtain data about songs such as importance, cycles, ranges, clustering, and get recommendations of users or songs. The application works on the analysis of a database released by Spotify in TSV format. Different graphs are modeled that allow us to apply various algorithms for the analysis of their data.

ADVENTOFCODE2023.TITLE: Advent of Code 2023
ADVENTOFCODE2023.CONTENT: Advent of Code is an Advent calendar of small programming puzzles for a variety of skill sets and skill levels that can be solved in any programming language you like. People use them as interview prep, company training, university coursework, practice problems, a speed contest, or to challenge each other.

EVNEWYEAR.TITLE: Evangelion New Year Timer
EVNEWYEAR.CONTENT: Evangelion New Year Timer is a timer that displays the time remaining until the next year. It's more of a curiosity than a project; I've only dedicated an afternoon to it. It's only available on PC and some tablets. It's inspired by a scene from one of my favorite series, Evangelion.

GOJUON.TITLE: Gojūon
GOJUON.CONTENT: Gojuon is an application primarily designed for mobile devices. You can consult and practice the two syllabaries used in Japanese writing: Hiragana and Katakana.
